item.title: AES Intro

item.title: Game Of Luck

item.title: RSA Intro

item.title: Mais ou est pass√© mon flag
item.description: We are given a disk.img file and asked to recover the flag. We are told that the flag has been deleted by mistake.

item.title: Mais qui est le photographe?
item.description: I am given the following image: I must find out who took this photo: Aperisolve ExifTool Creator : Michel DUPUIS CTFREI{MICHEL-DUPUIS}.

item.title: Memoire 1
item.description: I am given a .vmem file and I must find out the name of the computer Volatility 3 python3 vol.py -f ../../../ctfrei/ forensic/memory/memory.vmem windows.info.Info Volatility 3 Framework 2.10.0 Progress: 100.00 PDB scanning finished Variable Value Kernel Base 0xf80330002000 DTB 0x1ad000 Symbols file:...

item.title: Memoire 2
item.description: I am asked to get a Word file that the user of the PC was writing on.
